//
//   float4 GridSize;
//   float4x4 LocalToWorld;
//   float3 TemporalAAParameters;
//   float4x4 ViewProjectionMatrix;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                 Reg   Size
//   -------------------- ----- ----
//   ViewProjectionMatrix c0       4
//   LocalToWorld         c6       4
//   TemporalAAParameters c10      1
//   GridSize             c11      1
//

    vs_3_0
    def c4, -0.5, 1, 0, 0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_texcoord v1
    dcl_texcoord o0
    dcl_texcoord4 o1
    dcl_position o2

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s3

    mul o0, c4.yyzz, v1.xyxx
    add r0.xy, c4.x, v1
    mul r0.xy, r0, c11
    mul r1, r0.y, c7
    mad r0, c6, r0.x, r1
    mad r0, c8, v0.x, r0
    add r0, r0, c9
    mul r1, r0.y, c1
    mad r1, c0, r0.x, r1
    mad r1, c2, r0.z, r1
    mad r0, c3, r0.w, r1
    mul r1.x, r0.w, c10.z
    mad r0.xy, r1.x, c10, r0

mov o2, r0 // Relocated from line 43 with shadertool.py

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-vertex-halo --only-autofixed --stereo-sampler-vs=s3 3FAAF763.txt
texldl r31, c220.z, s3
add r31.w, r0.w, -r31.y
mad r0.x, r31.w, r31.x, r0.x

    mov o1, r0

//     mov o2, r0 // Relocated to line 42 with shadertool.py

// approximately 15 instruction slots used
